text: A referendum on the territorial dispute with Guatemala was originally and initially scheduled to be held in Belize on 10 April 2019, but the date has now been delayed and set on 8 May 2019. Yes : 58% No : 42% The purpose of this referendum is to ask the Belizeans If they agree that their neighbouring country, Guatemala and their country, Belize request the International Court of Justice (ICJ) to finally resolve the Belizean-Guatemala territorial dispute. Category:2010s in Belize Category:Politics of Belize Category:Politics of Guatemala Category:May 2019 events Category:Referendums
title: 2019 Belizean territorial dispute referendum
